org.db4ospring
Class ConfigurationFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
  org.db4ospring.ConfigurationFactoryBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class ConfigurationFactoryBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean

Factory Bean used for settings db4o Configuration object. Note that Configuration are singleton (one per VM) and changing the parameters affects all db4o engines started afterwards inside that VM. This class is needed as db4o configuration object doesn't respect JavaBeans conventions and thus Spring can't inject the properties.

Author:
Costin Leau
